casebody.data:
The State ex rel. Cooper Tire & Rubber Company, Appellee, v. Industrial Commission of Ohio et al.; Martin, Appellant.

[Cite as State ex rel. Cooper Tire & Rubber Co. v. Indus. Comm. (1998), 83 Ohio St.3d 526.]

(No. 98-192 Submitted September 15, 1998 Decided November 10, 1998.) Bugbee & Conkle and Robert P. King, for appellee. Larrimer & hammer and David H. Swanson, for appellant.

The judgment of the court of appeals is reversed, and the order of the Industrial Commission is reinstated.

Douglas, Resnick, F.E. Sweeney, Cook and Lundberg Stratton, JJ., concur. Moyer, C.J., dissents and would affirm the judgment of the court of appeals. Pfeifer, J., dissents.
